title: We Came to See You, Hiroshima! Part 1
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>We’re heeeeeere!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>We’ve finally made it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hiroshimaaaa!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>We came to see everyone~ That’s why eye am here, after all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I can’t wait to hang out with everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I want to chat a lot!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’m looking forward to some passionate discussions!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I wanna daaaaance!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Hey, hey, can Lanzhu greet everyone first?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I wanna do it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Please, let me do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hey, hey~ No fighting, okay? Let’s compromise. I’ll be the one to greet everyone first, alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>No fairrrr!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>No fairrrr!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>In that case, let’s decide with rock-paper-scissors! I’m not gonna lose!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
